# init(url:)

**Initializer**

Return a user script task instance given a URL for a script file.

## Declaration

```swift
init(url: URL) throws
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The script URL.

## Return Value

An instance of an `NSUserScriptTask` subclass or `nil` if the file does not appear to match any of the known types.

## Discussion

The returned object will be of one of the specific sub-classes ([doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserUnixTask], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAppleScriptTask], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAutomatorTask]), or `nil` if the file does not appear to match any of the known types.

If invoked from a subclass, the result will be that class or `nil`.



## Specifying the Script

- **scriptURL**: The URL of the script file.

items.description: The URL of the script file.
